content: सभ्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [सभायां साधु यत्] {@--1@} Belonging to an assembly. {@--2@} Fit for society. {@--3@} Refined, polished, civilized. {@--4@} Well-bred, polite, civil, courteous; <ls>R. 1. 55</ls>, <ls>Ku. 7. 29.</ls> {@--5@} Confidential, trusty, faithful. --भ्यः {@--1@} An assessor. {@--2@} An assistant at an assembly. {@--3@} A person of honourable parentage. {@--4@} The keeper of a gaming-house. {@--5@} The servant of the keeper of a gaming-house. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the five sacred fires.
